attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The chinese government are using the "crime" of "inciting subversion of state power and the socialist system" as a smokescreen to silence and jail human rights activists & whistleblowers. This freedom of speech is a basic human right, and the british government should make it clear to the chinese government that this smokescreen is seen for what it is, and is completely unacceptable to  the british people & others all around the world

rejection.details: Such cases are a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
